data.title: Dave Riley & Bob Corritore Photos

data.text:
The Mississippi-meets-Chicago team of Dave Riley and Bob Corritore has been widely received. They met in 2004 at the King Biscuit Blues Festival in Helena, Arkansas, and released the BMA and BBMA-nominated album Travelin’ The Dirt Road on Blue Witch Records in 2007. Their sound demonstrates a natural musical chemistry and friendship, and is pure down-home blues.

Blue Witch Records Promo Photo

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore during a 2005 filming in Helena Arkansas. Photo by DJ Gary Miller.

Bob Corritore & Dave Riley at the Glendale Blues Festival in Glendale, Arizona

(Photo by David Blake)

Dave Riley & Bob Corritore’s BMA Nomination Certificate

Dave Riley & Bob Corritore’s Blues Blast Music Award Nomination Plaque

Carla Robinson, Dave Riley, Bob Corritore at the 2005 Arkansas Blues & Heritage Festival

performing a John Weston memorial tribute set

(Photo by Dusty Blues)

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore at the 2008 Cognac Blues Festival. Photo El-F.

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore perform at the 2010 Mississippi Valley Blued Festival in Davenport, Iowa. Photo by Skyy Dobro.

Outside the club Goorblues in Gooreind, Belgium in May 2011. Photo by Nanny Kujuiter.

Bob Corritore, Dave Riley performing at the Connor Hotel, Helena, Arkansas as part of the 2011 King Biscuit Blues Festival. Photo by Nanny Kajuiter.

Bob Corritore, Johnny Rawls, Dave Riley 2011 at the Rhythm Room.

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore at Desert Ridge Blues Festival, Phoenix, 2011. Photo Dave Blake.

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore at the 2011 Pinetop Perkins homecoming, Clarksdale honoring the fallen heroes pictured behind them. Photo by Bob Margolin.

Bob Corritore and Dave Riley in Pocas de Caldas, Brazil, 2011. Photo Luciano Boca.

Bob Corritore and Dave Riley performing at Hunky Dory in Leiden, Holland, 2011. Photo by Nanny Kajuiter.

This one is from the photo shoot for the album Hush Your Fuss! Photographer is Dave Blake.

Dave Riley & Bob Corritore appearing at the 2014 Chicago Blues Festival. Photo by Marilyn Stringer.

Bob and Dave in San Diego, 2015.

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore perform at the 2015 Vache de Blues Festival in France. Photo by H. Stanciu.

Brian Fahey, Dave Riley, Bob Corritore, Yahni Riley. Photo by Dave Blake.

Bob Corritore, Dave Riley at the Rhythm Room on June 29, 2019. Photo by Elaine Thomas Campbell.

Photo by Dave Blake

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore at the Rhythm Room.

Dave Riley and Bob Corritore at the Rhythm Room on March 14, 2020. This was their last show before the pandemic. Photo Elaine Thomas Campbell.

Dave Riley, T-Model Ford, Bob Corritore, Rodney Brown (drummer of Dyke & The Blazers) hanging out at the Rhythm Room.
